before_segment_note.title: Data processing - Batch, MapReduce, Streaming
before_segment_note.text: The next 2 categories are all about data processing mechnisms. We'll start with batch processing and MapReduce, typically with Hadoop. This is considered the first gen of data processing. From there we'll go to stram processing, typically done with Spark. These subjects are deeply connected. For example, Spark can operate on HDFS which is the file system for Hadoop. Even though it would seem outdated to learn about batch processing with Hadoop, it is essential to understand the subject even if you plan to live the streaming data life.

batch_data_processing_and_map_reduce.description: The "first" generation of data processing, using Hadoop and Spring. Everyone should know how it works, but going deep into the details and operations are recommended only if necessary. Focus more on streaming with tools like Spark today.

resources.author: talend
